description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension (incorporating a juliet balcony)
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of rear dormer roof extension (incorporating a juliet balcony) falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 34 (Wind Mitigation) of planning permission 20/02942/FUL states:Prior to the commencement of development (other than demolition and site enabling works) in any Phase or Development Plot (Other than Phase 1), details of mitigation for wind, including roof top enclosures, to be submitted for approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority for that phase. The scheme approved by the Local Planning Authority shall be fully implemented and maintained. Reason: To achieve an acceptable wind climate within the public realm.Officer response: The submitted information is considered to be sufficient. As such, the details submitted in relation to condition  34 (Wind Mitigation) Plot E, Phase 1 are hereby approved.

Please revise the "Householder Checklist " with correct informationThe new Householder Local List and Checklist can be obtained via the council's website: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications
